pr_title: [JENKINS-62332] Show when a plugin version newer than offered exists

timeline.message: [JENKINS-62332] Show when a plugin version newer than offered exists

timeline.bodyText: Isn't this taken care of in the plugin.latest calculation?
timeline.author: varyvol

replies.bodyText: This code supports latest being added to JSON even if the latest release is being offered. While that's not the behavior of update-center2 in the linked PR, I wouldn't consider it wrong.
replies.author: daniel-beck

replies.bodyText: Maybe it's not wrong, but isn't it more sensible to make both sides have the same behaviour? I believe it's easier to undertand.
replies.author: varyvol

timeline.message:
Add more obvious label/tag to entries that cannot be installed

Also link to plugin documentation from the detail message
Also show the list if there are any unavailable updates
